Foes' Use of Savior:
In Pawns of Loki, foes who have
the Savior skill effect will not be
able to trigger the effect.

Want to change your appearance
and skills in My Summoner?

The following skills can no longer be
equipped, so they will be removed.

Change Weapon:
Your summoner can use different
weapon types.

When you change your weapon
type, skills the newly equipped
weapon is incompatible with will
be removed.

Unable to add Feh Pass benefits.

◆ For more information on Feh Pass,
please check the FAQ.

◆ Please read the explanation of how
subscription periods are calculated
after restoration, found in the FAQ.

◆ Information on restoring Feh Pass
benefits to the Apple ID and save
data used to subscribe can also be
found in the FAQ.

◆ Please read the explanation of how
subscription periods are calculated
after restoration, found in the FAQ.

◆ Information on restoring Feh Pass
benefits to the Google Account and
save data used to subscribe can also
be found in the FAQ.

Your Feh Pass subscription has
expired. You must have an active
subscription to enjoy access to
the benefits of Feh Pass.

◆ Your subscription period will reset
in 7 days (168 hours) if not renewed.

◆ Renew your Feh Pass subscription
to regain access to Feh Pass benefits.

Your Feh Pass subscription has been
suspended because your payment
method could not be authorized.
If you want to renew your Feh Pass
subscription, please update your
payment method.

◆ Your subscription period will reset
in 7 days (168 hours) if not renewed.

◆ You must update your payment
method to be able to use Feh Pass.

Feh Pass benefits have been restored
from different save data. To continue
receiving Feh Pass benefits using the
current save data, you can subscribe
to Feh Pass now.

◆ For more on subscribing or restoring
    Feh Pass, please check the FAQ.
◆ If you restore your subscription within
    7 days (168 hours), your subscription
    will be treated as if it was continuous.
◆ If you do not renew your Feh Pass
    subscription, you will no longer have
    access to the benefits of Feh Pass.

The current save data and Feh Pass are
no longer linked.

The game will now start with Feh Pass
in an unsubscribed state.

◆ If you believe your Feh Pass should
    not have been canceled, please
    submit an inquiry via the in-app
    Customer Support menu.

Reserves:
A place that houses Heroes apart
from your normal barracks.

There are 10 total reserves and
each reserve can house up to
100 Heroes in it.

Move to Reserves:
You can move Heroes from your
barracks into your reserves.

Manage Groups:
Heroes in your barracks and
reserves can always be moved
into other barracks or reserves.

Recommended for detailed
Hero organization.

More Information:
Heroes moved into the reserves
will have their seals, accessories,
Pair Ups, Summoner Support,
and related benefits removed.

Alfonse, Sharena, and Anna
cannot be moved into any of
the reserves.
Enter a name for this reserve.

Choose a name of 12 or fewer
characters. Some symbols cannot
be used.

You have exceeded your maximum
number of Heroes.
Where do you want your Heroes?

Select Heroes to move to your
reserves from your barracks.
There are no Heroes in this reserve.
